general.about:
The [NextGrid](http://nextgrid.digital) Manifesto

At NextGrid, we architect digital ecosystems where every interaction tells a story, every animation sparks joy, and every line of code pushes the boundaries of what's possible on the web.

* Product Design

* Web Design

* Branding

* Motion Graphics

* UX Copywrting

Our mission? To make the internet a more beautiful, functional, and delightfully weird place—one project at a time.

projects.heading: QikCollect - Product Design , Branding, Web Design at QikCollect
projects.description: Qikcollect.ai is an innovative platform designed to streamline the management of receivables and communication through AI and automation.
projects.title: QikCollect - Product Design , Branding, Web Design

projects.heading: Preskale – Product Design , Website Refresh at Preskale
projects.description:
This project showcases our ability to maintain and enhance the UI and UX of a complex SaaS dashboard meant for Sales Engineers to stremline their leads and their impact. \
\
By continuously refining Preskale's interface and functionality, we've significantly improved user engagement and conversion rates, demonstrating the power of persistent, user-centric design in the SaaS space.
projects.title: Preskale – Product Design , Website Refresh

projects.heading: Bridgetown – Branding, Logo, Web at Bridgetown Research
projects.description: Focusing on creating a cohesive visual identity that aligns with the company's mission of delivering tailored insights and scientific rigor.
projects.title: Bridgetown – Branding, Logo, Web

projects.heading: Webflow Consultant at Docsumo
projects.description:
As a Webflow Consultant for Docsumo, I specialized in streamlining the CMS architecture to enhance efficiency and scalability for programmatic SEO.\
\
Additionally, I contributed to adding various functionalities to Docsumo.com, improving the website's overall user experience and functionality, aligning with the company's strategic goals. My expertise in Webflow enabled Docsumo to leverage the platform's full potential, ensuring a robust and SEO-friendly website architecture.\
\
Services Offered:

1. Webflow Development

2. Programmatic SEO CMS Setup
projects.title: Webflow Consultant

projects.heading: Convert GPT
projects.description: Convert GPT – Convert anything to anything As a designer, I needed a solution for seamless image conversions. So, I built my own custom GPT.
projects.title: Convert GPT

projects.heading: Manasvini's Portfolio at Manasvini
projects.description: A distinctive, interactive, and playful digital portfolio for Manasvini Ligga, tailored to showcase her unique identity and expertise in performance marketing.
projects.title: Manasvini's Portfolio

projects.heading: Product Design : OSlash Copilot at OSlash
projects.description: OSlash Copilot, an plug and play integration for your product, team or yourself.
projects.title: Product Design : OSlash Copilot

projects.heading: Prototype : Clara at OSlash
projects.description: Clara is a prototype of an AI copilot for products that I designed in collaboration with OSlash to gather early feedback, which ultimately paved the way for OSlash Copilot.
projects.title: Prototype : Clara

projects.heading: Prototype : Clyde at OSlash
projects.description: Clyde is a prototype of an AI copilot designed for personal and team use cases, created in partnership with OSlash to collect early feedback, which ultimately guided us to the development of OSlash Copilot.
projects.title: Prototype : Clyde

projects.heading: Web design and Branding : OSlash.com at OSlash
projects.description:
Designing OSlash.com using Webflow and Figma 

UI/UX research, Designing Wireframes and Prototyping ,
- OSlash Copilot integration
- Automating lead generation to capture market use cases
- Strategizing and implementing marketing campaigns
- Competitor analysis and SEO 

Tools : Webflow, Figma, Zapier, Javascript, Google Analytics
projects.title: Web design and Branding : OSlash.com

sideProjects.heading: Design Partner at GTM Bolt
sideProjects.description: I took the lead as the designer behind GTM Bolt, where I was responsible for creating the landing page, establishing the brand identity, and designing all visual assets.
sideProjects.title: Design Partner

sideProjects.heading: Spatial OS Keyboard at Spline
sideProjects.description:
Playground: Spline
Been playing around with something pretty cool, and I can't wait to share it with you all!

An Interactive Keyboard for Vision Pro Spatial OS, brought to life with a tool I'm totally hooked on – #spline an Interactive Keyboard for VisionProSpatialOS that feels as real as it gets, right at your fingertips!
sideProjects.title: Spatial OS Keyboard

sideProjects.heading: Portfolio Template at Webflow
sideProjects.description: Eclipse and Ascent | Portfolio crafted for Product Designers on Webflow
sideProjects.title: Portfolio Template

sideProjects.heading: Text FX with Google
sideProjects.description: Google TextFX is a creative powerhouse fueled by Google's PaLM 2 model. With 10 AI tools, it reimagines how artists and creators approach text.
sideProjects.title: Text FX with Google

sideProjects.heading: Open Interpreter at Framer
sideProjects.description: An hero section showcasing open interpreter's hero section with the background video
sideProjects.title: Open Interpreter

sideProjects.heading: Anterra Studio
sideProjects.description:
Interactive Webflow Website - Anterra Studio

I and Dre (Anterra Studio's in-house designer), united talents to craft an interactive Webflow website that brings to life Anterra Studio's transformative work in masterplanning and design. The website serves as a vibrant showcase of their innovative services, highlighting their contributions to the built environment and community development, with a focus on notable projects like the Green Park Residences development
sideProjects.title: Anterra Studio

sideProjects.heading: Ben Hyde's Portfolio at Moontek
sideProjects.description: Collaborating with Moontek Solutions to migrate Ben Hyde's portfolio from Wix to Webflow, enhancing the visual appeal and user experience. The project showcased Ben's expertise in commercial editing, directing, motion graphics, and his role as a non-executive director in community growth. The result is a modern, responsive website that reflects his creativity and professionalism.
sideProjects.title: Ben Hyde's Portfolio

talks.heading: Journey from Webflow to Product Design at Webflow Meetup Bengaluru
talks.description:
Hosted my first ever Webflow Meetup to 

🤝 Network with like-minded individuals
🌟 Share your experiences and insights
🔍 Learn from experts in the field
talks.title: Journey from Webflow to Product Design

writing.heading: Unveiling the Evolution of AI : A Journey Through the 7 Stages, medium
writing.description:
Unveiling the Evolution of AI : A Journey Through the 7 Stages

This article discusses the seven stages of artificial intelligence (AI) and its evolution from rule-based systems to the theoretical concept of the singularity.
writing.title: Unveiling the Evolution of AI : A Journey Through the 7 Stages

awards.heading: CloneComp Winners from Finsweet + Webflow
awards.description:
CloneComp is a four day Webflow specific hackathon designed to test your skills and connect you with top makers in the no code community. 

Taking inspiration from popular online cooking shows, CloneComp blends time capped web development with story-driven daily prompts that challenge participants to weave creative story lines into engaging digital experiences.
awards.title: CloneComp Winners

workExperience.heading: Designpreneur at NextGrid
workExperience.description:
Webflow Template Designer
At NextGrid we hand-craft aesthetically designed templates in Webflow and Framer, making it the best solutions for businesses to launch their marketing websites quickly.

We also take up custom projects to help startups create their brand and identity on the web. With a keen eye for design and a knack for problem-solving, We transform boring websites into engaging, interactive experiences that keep visitors coming back for more.
workExperience.title: Designpreneur

workExperience.heading: Webflow Designer at OSlash
workExperience.description:
Webmaster | Webflow designer at OSlash

The role comprised of responsibilities including :

* Designing OSlash.com \[Webflow\]
* UI/UX research, Designing Wireframes and Prototyping \[Figma\]
* Tool integrations
* Strategizing and implementing marketing campaigns
* Competitor analysis and SEO

Designed visually appealing and intuitive user interfaces that drive website traffic and conversions to deliver the best possible user experiences and drive business growth.

Skills: Startup Marketing · User Experience Design (UED) · User Experience (UX) · Graphic Design · Design · Design Thinking · Content Marketing · Marketing · Webflow · Web Design
workExperience.title: Webflow Designer

workExperience.heading: Product Designer at Oslash
workExperience.description:
With a strong background in web design, a deep understanding of how to create seamless user experiences that drive engagement and conversion I wm now promoted to a product designer where I am involved in creating the chat interface for OSlash Copilot

Skills: Prototyping · Wireframing · Design Management · Product Marketing · Product Design · Design · User Interface Design · Software Design · Design Thinking · Content Marketing · Marketing · Multi-Channel Marketing · Web Design
workExperience.title: Product Designer

workExperience.heading: Test Automation Engineer at Mindteck
workExperience.description:
Test Engineer | Phillips
certified • Python Programming Expert 

Responsibilities:
• Automation analysis and identification • Test Automation using Selenium with Python • Embedded systems testing • API testing • Test case preparation and execution • Manual testing
workExperience.title: Test Automation Engineer

workExperience.heading: Test Engineer at RAD365
workExperience.description:
Test Engineer | Phillips
certified • Python Programming Expert 

Skills:
• Automation analysis and identification • Test Automation using Selenium with Python • Embedded systems testing • API testing • Test case preparation and execution • Manual testing
workExperience.title: Test Engineer
